api.apiRequestFailed: API request failed, please try again later!

api.errMsg401: User does not have permission (token, username, or password error)!

api.errMsg500: Server error, please contact the administrator!
api.errMsg503: Service unavailable, server temporarily overloaded or under maintenance!
api.errMsg505: HTTP version not supported for the request!
